dialogue_lines: I can't believe we're presenting today. My stomach is already doing flips.
You've got this. Besides, we rehearsed like five times.
Yeah, but what if the projector fails? Or I blank out?
Then I'll jump in and distract them with my charm. Obviously.
Relax. Once we get coffee, your whole vibe will reset.
choice_sets: I just want this to be over so we can celebrate.
Only if the coffee is spiked with liquid courage
What if it’s a total disaster though?
I’m scared I’ll mess up in front of everyone.
Wait, is the last homework uploaded?!?
response_dialogue: Exactly! We’re gonna ace it, then it’s cocktails and gossip time. I already picked out the perfect bar.
If you sneak Baileys into your latte, I’m telling—but like, in a supportive way.
Honestly though, caffeine is all the courage we need today.
Then we handle it, like we always do. You’re not doing this alone, We are all with you the whole time.
You’re allowed to be scared, but don’t forget—you’re also prepared.
You’ve worked hard for this, and that’s what people will see.
Color-coded chaos or just vibes? Either way, as long as you leave room for caffeine and brilliance, we’re fine.
Caffeine’s already booked the front row. Chaos can stand in the back.
Yes, I checked, like, three times. Breathe.
If it’s not, we ride or die together. I’m not going down alone for this group grade.
Girl, if it’s not, we’re uploading it from the parking lot. Wi-Fi and panic mode: activated.
